title: I didn't get my level reward in level 40
body:
Hi i just want to ask, i saw my reward when i reached level 40 but i didn't see the loot in the menu, so i dont know what happened, i think its a bug. But i dont know how to show you this, cause i dont have proof, Is it possible to check the game system diary ? i mean, when i reached level 40  the system does not save the information i opened or i got the item? 
Thanks if you have a time:)

replies.body:
Strange that you never saw the capsule or anything in your loot. I can see that you got the level 40 capsule and it was opened about 5 min later. Looks like you got....

- Tryndamere
-  Shaco
-  Rakan
-  Legend 1 emote

The same has happened to myself after a match that leveled me to rank 34. This is a bug that occurs when you receive Mastery Level Up (4,5, or a shard for 6 or 7) or receive a chest for someone getting an S in the same time that you are leveling up. The Drop never occurs due to the Mastery Stuff popping up. The same can be said for the quest loot that you are supposed to receive after you complete a match. If you get a mastery level up (4,5 etc) it causes the quest loot to NOT be given to the player. I would really like for this to be looked into further by Riot Staff to ensure that all players are getting the items that they earned throughout the new leveling system. Thanks for taking the time to look into bug report posts.
*(Both of these scenarios have occurred to myself)

I still have the same problem. Ive been waiting for weeks. Im currently level 44 and still havent reecieved my emote. I had the notification saying I got the capsule but never recieved it in my inventory. Please help :(
same thing happened to me :[ i got the notification but opened the loot and nothing was there.
Yeah the same thing happened to me, but i didnt get a capsule at all at level 40.
This happened to me too! when i got to level 34
